channel.title: Projects on Chris Turner
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Chris Turner

item.title: COVID Spike Protein Mutation Exploratory Data Analysis
item.description: 0. Introduction COVID-19 is an infectionus disease caused by Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2). First identified in December of 2019, SARS-CoV-2 resulted in an ongoing pandemic effecting over 39 million people in 189 countries, but the WHO predicts that with asymptomatic cases, the number of infections may be closer to 800 million. Therapeutics for those suffering from COVID-19 include collecting and transplanting neautralizing antibodies from patients who have recoved from COVID-19.

item.title: Project 2
item.description: 0. Background From the original authors of the dataset: “These are data from one of the first successful trials of adjuvant chemotherapy for colon cancer. Levamisole is a low-toxicity compound previously used to treat worm infestations in animals; 5-FU is a moderately toxic (as these things go) chemotherapy agent. There are two records per person, one for recurrence and one for death.” This porject will explore the follwoing variables AT THE TIME OF DEATH from the colon dataset: Categorical (2-5 groups) - rx Treatment : Obs(ervation), Lev(amisole), Lev(amisole)+5-FU - differ Differentiation of tumour : 1=well, 2=moderate, 3=poor - extent Extent of local spread : 1=submucosa, 2=muscle, 3=serosa, 4=contiguous structures - sex (binary) : 1=male - obstruct (binary) obstruction of colon by tumour : 1=yes Numeric (more than 10 values) - age (numeric) : in years - time (numeric) days until death - nodes (numeric) number of lymph nodes with detectable cancer After omitting NA;s, 888 unique partient observations were left.
